emr_vis_nlp.view.doc_map

Class DocumentTreeMapView.TreeMapRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • prefuse.render.AbstractShapeRenderer
      • prefuse.render.ShapeRenderer
        • emr_vis_nlp.view.doc_map.DocumentTreeMapView.TreeMapRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    prefuse.render.Renderer
    Enclosing class:
    DocumentTreeMapView

    public static class DocumentTreeMapView.TreeMapRenderer
extends prefuse.render.ShapeRenderer
    A renderer for treemap nodes. Draws simple rectangles, but defers the bounds management to the layout. Leaf nodes are drawn fully, higher level nodes only have their outlines drawn. Labels are rendered for top-level (i.e., depth 1) subtrees.
